20 // stdio
21 #include <memory>

23 // ros
24 #include <ros/ros.h>
25 
26 // niryo
27 #include "end_effector_interface/end_effector_interface_core.hpp"
28 #include "ttl_driver/ttl_interface_core.hpp"
29 
30 int main(int argc, char **argv)
31 {
32  ros::init(argc, argv, "end_effector_interface_node");
33 
34  ROS_DEBUG("Launching end_effector_interface_node");
35 
36  ros::AsyncSpinner spinner(4);
37  spinner.start();
38 
39  ros::NodeHandle nh_ttl("ttl_driver");
40  ros::NodeHandle nh("end_effector_interface");
41 
42  auto ttl_driver = std::make_shared<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore>(nh_ttl);
43  ros::Duration(1).sleep();
44 
45  auto tool = std::make_shared<end_effector_interface::EndEffectorInterfaceCore>(nh, ttl_driver);
46  ros::Duration(1).sleep();
47 
48  ros::waitForShutdown();
49 
50  ROS_INFO("Tools Interface - Shutdown node");
51 }
